result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Buy-hold Return** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(404) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false library(webexercises) p_buy <- rnorm(1, mean = 50, sd = 5) p_sell <- rnorm(1, mean = 55, sd = 5) div_yield <- rnorm(1, mean = 2, sd = 0.5) ``` ::: You bought a stock for \$ **53.87** per share and sold it later for \$ **55.3**. It paid \$ **1.84** in dividends over the period. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Holding period return = (p_sell − p_buy + div_yield)/p_buy × 100 = **6.07**%.
::: :::
